channel.title: Noobscape advertisement **SOLVED**
channel.description:
call me a noob but i cant for the life of me find out where these messages are stored and where they can be edited. server messages like: "thanks for playing noobscape v3.0, Playername" "if you need help contact admin, mod, or pmod". :palm:
i have transfered my custom items/etc and more to a noobscape source would like to remove some of these messages like the one that contains rules because i wont have rules lol!' ***FIXED*** LMFAO I AM SUCH A NOOB! no idea why this took so long lmfao Adverts.xml.

item.title: Noobscape advertisement **SOLVED**

call me a noob but i cant for the life of me find out where these messages are stored and where they can be edited.
server messages like: “thanks for playing noobscape v3.0, Playername”
“if you need help contact admin, mod, or pmod”. :palm:
